participant_1.background:
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I treasure my computer because it's how I make my music.
My most valuable possession is my intellect, which I plan to use to take over the world.
I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
i ride my bike to class since its only a mile away.

participant_2.background:
I have a secret stash of snacks in my room that my parents don't know about.
i have been at my job for seven years.
I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair.
I want to use my skills to help people in need.
during the week , i work as a barista.

content.text: Hello! I'm a PhD student in astrophysics. What do you do for a living?
Hi! I am a barista, but I'm also a musician. I've been working at the same coffee shop for seven years.
Oh cool, I love music! What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and sing. I'm also a songwriter.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to play guitar.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. What kind of music do you write?
I write mostly indie rock music.
Oh cool, I like indie rock. What's your favorite song that you've written?
I don't know, I really like all of my songs.
Well, you should share your music with me sometime. I'd love to hear it.
Great! I'm going to go get some coffee now. What would you like?
I'll have a large latte, please.
